question.title: How to use threads in for loop
question.body:
I have a method call in a while loop with different objects but it was taking time as it will wait for method execution to complete on each loop iteration.

Is there any way that I can call the methods in parallel without waiting for method completion?

Sample code below:

while (iter.hasNext) {
    Object value = iter.next();
    result.add(method(value));
}

Is there any way to call method(value) in parallel for several values?
